en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Shanghai

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Shanghai on March 16 and 17 to attend the 3rd Shanghai-Hong Kong Commercial Mediation Forum.

Jointly organised by the Shanghai Commercial Mediation Center, the Joint Mediation Helpline Office and the Hong Kong Mediation Council, the forum will provide a platform for mediation organisations in Shanghai and Hong Kong to explore diversified models of commercial mediation and to share views and information on the latest developments of mediation services in the two places.

Mr Yuen will arrive in Shanghai on March 16 and attend the forum's welcome dinner. On March 17, he will deliver a keynote speech at the forum to promote Hong Kong as a centre for international legal and dispute resolution services in the Asia-Pacific region.

During his visit, he will also meet with officials of the Shanghai Municipal Bureau of Justice to exchange views on legal co-operation between Shanghai and Hong Kong and other matters of mutual interest.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the evening on March 17.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師將於三月十六日至十七日訪問上海，出席第三屆滬港商事調解論壇。
該論壇由上海經貿商事調解中心、聯合調解專線辦事處及香港調解會合辦，為上海和香港的調解機構提供平台探討多元化的商事調解模式，並就兩地調解服務的最新發展交流意見和資訊。
袁國強將於三月十六日抵達上海並出席論壇的歡迎晚宴。他將於三月十七日在論壇上發表主題演說，推廣香港作為亞太區國際法律及解決爭議服務中心。
訪問上海期間，他亦會與上海市司法局官員會面，就滬港法律合作及其他雙方關注的事項交換意見。
袁國強將於三月十七日晚上返港。
